title: Garo: Vanishing Line (GARO -VANISHING LINE-)
synopsis: Corruption looms over the prosperous Russell City, where manifestations of negative emotions called Horrors cause chaos and mayhem. The Makai Order is the last bastion of hope against these unholy creatures. Using several small businesses as fronts, they deploy powerful Makai Knights and magical Makai Alchemists to combat the Horror threat.
related_anime: ['Garo: Honoo no Kokuin', 'Garo: Guren no Tsuki']
